title: Disconnected from chat
body:
Hi riot,

I play league of legends 3 years, and this is first time i leave message on the board. Could you plz fix the chat issue? This is happened on last week and already 4 or 5 days.  I thought it is my personal issue. I tried several way: CMD, IP helper, unstall and Install leagues. but I still cannot connect to the chat service. I could not play with any my friends. PLZ fixed it! I am appreciated it.

replies.body: Try connecting your computer directly to your modem, decent workaround for me a few days ago.

From what it sounds like, your network is having a hard time connecting to our chat servers. I know you've already tried a few steps, but have you tried all the steps in the [Troubleshooting Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)? This should rule out many of the common causes of why you can't connect to chat.
I and a few other people had this same problem a few days ago, it eventually resolved itself. You can take a look at my last ticket for more info
